screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint,gFont orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 90,textsize[1] + 90) offset = 45 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 161 wsizex = textsize[0] + 107 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 96) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15,textsize[1] + 41)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["list"].instance.setFont(gFont("Regular", 30)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxGenuine
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint,gFont orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() # y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 75, textsize[1] + 75) offset = 0 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 131 wsizex = textsize[0] + 87 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex, 75) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(0, textsize[1] + 41)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["list"].instance.setFont(gFont("Regular", 30)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet: # this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint,gFont orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize() textsize = (textsize[0] + 90,textsize[1] + 90) offset = 45 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 161 wsizex = textsize[0] + 107 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (420 > wsizex): wsizex = 420 wsize = (wsizex,wsizey) # resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize)) # resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize)) # move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 96) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(15,textsize[1] + 41)) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize)) self["list"].instance.setFont(gFont("Regular", 30)) # center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))
